about.content: I combine strong communication skills with technical abilities to be active collaborator in driving software creation and maintenance.  I am able to handle different working styles and transform problems into effective technical solutions. With an interest and ability to learn, I am keen to keep involved in a team where my skills can grow.

experiences.title: Student Engineer
achievements: Developed and maintained frontend features using React and TypeScript, focusing on clean, user-friendly interfaces.
Collaborated with backend engineers to integrate APIs and ensure reliable full-stack functionality.
Worked closely with cross-functional teams in agile format to turn user insights into meaningful product improvements.
Took ownership of frontend tasks end-to-end, delivering high-quality, maintainable code aligned with project goals.

experiences.title: Customer Advisor
achievements: Provided technical support to UK-based customers via chat and phone, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Collaborated with Product and Engineering teams to resolve issues and improve platform usability.
Created and maintained help center content to improve clarity and accessibility for users.
Coordinated internally to support accurate and timely feature releases, improving overall product quality.

publications.title: Masters Thesis – User Motivation: Case Study of Zeeguu
publications.description: Conducted structured interviews with 20 users to uncover motivations and translate insights into actionable requirements. Delivered an end-to-end progress-tracking feature and collaborated closely with stakeholders to shape a user-aligned UX.

publications.title: WhattoWea(th)er Copenhagen
publications.description: Built a web app using OpenAI and OpenWeather APIs to recommend what users should wear based on the weather in Copenhagen. Developed a smooth, intuitive interface with a lightweight user flow and room for future expansion.
